Activities I performed during my graduation

# MC404 - Organização de Computadores e Linguagem de Montagem / Computer Organization and Assembly Language

- Activities involving low-level assembly language programming, especially for RISC-V

Professor: Edson Borin 

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub-100000?style=for-the-badge&logo=github&logoColor=white)](https://github.com/EltonCN/MC404-Atividades)

![RISC-V](https://img.shields.io/badge/RISC--V-000000?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64,)
![C](https://img.shields.io/badge/C-00599C?style=for-the-badge&logo=c&logoColor=white)

# MS211 - Cálculo Numérico / Numerical analysis

- Non-linear system solver using Newton's Method
- Linear system solver using Gauss-Jabobi Method

Professor: Maicon Ribeiro Correa

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub-100000?style=for-the-badge&logo=github&logoColor=white)](https://github.com/EltonCN/Projeto-Nonlinear-System--MS211)

![C](https://img.shields.io/badge/C-00599C?style=for-the-badge&logo=c&logoColor=white)
![Mathematica](https://img.shields.io/badge/Mathematica-DD1100?style=for-the-badge&logo=wolframmathematica&logoColor=white)
